successes.title: DreamForge-Games model kit. Something wicked this way comes!
successes.description: DreamForge-Games plastic model kits and miniatures for tabletop gaming

Pledges.description:
-CATCH ALL PLEDGE- 
Pledging for multiple items? 
Not sure where to drop your pledge?
 Drop it here, when the Kickstarter ends we will send out a survey to collect the information of what Items you were backing. Just be sure to use the online calculator on the front page to total out your order and get the expected shipping dates for the items you wanted to back. We will confirm this against your total pledge and the information you provide us in the final survey. (The delivery date listed below is not necessarily when you will receive your items, it’s just a place holder). Thank you!

10 man rifle squad – Ten plastic Eisenkern Stormtroopers (equipped with rifles only, 4 shoulder fired and 3 each hip fired and at the ready arm poses). Ships free within the USA! Add $5.00 for international shipping.
Boots on the ground – Plastic twenty man Eisenkern Stormtroopers  (equipped as shown). Ships free within the USA! Add $5.00 for international shipping.

Mini-Me-  (1)  4 ½ tall  15mm – 1/100 scale plastic model kit of the Leviathan Crusader. That’s less than ½ the price of the fixed pose resin kit and made of injected plastic. This kit has all the features and details of its big brother, fully poseable, featuring quick swap weapon arms for future releases.
This kit comes complete with advanced capacitor coolers and the Excalibur sword option! Ships free within the USA! (Some exclusions apply, see delivery schedule for Staged Shipping restrictions)
Hold the line! – (2) Plastic twenty man Eisenkern Stormtroopers  (equipped as shown). Ships free within the USA! Add $7.00 for international shipping.

You’re not so tough! -  (2)  4 ½ tall  15mm – 1/100 scale plastic model kit of the Leviathan Crusader. That’s less than ½ the price of the fixed pose resin kit and made of injected plastic. This kit has all the features and details of its big brother, fully poseable, featuring quick swap weapon arms for future releases.
This kit comes complete with advanced capacitor coolers and the Excalibur sword option! Pledges at this level will also receive an invitation to the Iron-Core game development group. Ships free within the USA! (Some exclusions apply, see delivery schedule for Staged Shipping restrictions)

Git-some! – (3) Plastic twenty man Eisenkern Stormtroopers  (equipped as shown). Pledges at this level will also receive an invitation to the Iron-Core game development group. Ships free within the USA! Add $7.00 for international shipping.

Ready for Serious Stompin! - An 8 ½ tall plastic model kit of the Leviathan Crusader. That’s ¼ the price of a resin kit and made of injected plastic. Pledges at this level will also receive an invitation to the Iron-Core game development group and have access to the 50k and 60k stretch goals. Ships free within the USA! Add $25.00 for international shipping.

The gangs all here -  (3)  4 ½ tall  15mm – 1/100 scale plastic model kit of the Leviathan Crusader. That’s less than ½ the price of the fixed pose resin kit and made of injected plastic. This kit has all the features and details of its big brother, fully poseable, featuring quick swap weapon arms for future releases.
This kit comes complete with advanced capacitor coolers and the Excalibur sword option! Pledges at this level will also receive an invitation to the Iron-Core game development group. Ships free within the USA! (Some exclusions apply, see delivery schedule for Staged Shipping restrictions)

I Need a Wingman! - Two (2) Leviathan Crusader kits! Pledges at this level will also receive an invitation to the Iron-Core game development group and have access to the 50k and 60k stretch goals. Ships free within the USA! Add $25.00 for international shipping.

Armored Lance- Nothing says domination like three Leviathans on your gaming table. Three (3) Leviathan Crusader kits! Pledges at this level will also receive an invitation to the Iron-Core game development group and have access to the 50k and 60k stretch goals as well as a free pdf copy of the completed rules. *As the rules are a work in progress and shaped by your feedback there is not a firm release date at this time. Ships free within the USA! Add $30.00 for international shipping.

All your bases are ours! - So you killed one, laugh while you can, his three brothers are pissed! Four (4) Leviathan Crusader kits! Four plastic kits for less than a single resin kit… Pledges at this level will also receive an invitation to the Iron-Core game development group and have access to the 50k and 60k stretch goals, as well as a free pdf copy of the completed rules. *As the rules are a work in progress and shaped by your feedback. there is not a firm release date at this time. Ships free within the USA! Add $30.00 for international shipping.
